name: vsts-habitat-expose-habitat-build-vars
description: Expose the Habitat Plan build environment variables to the environment
author: Chef

inputs.name: habitatLastBuildEnvPath
inputs.label: Build Environment File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the `last_build.env` file or `last_build.ps1` file. The task will determine which one to use

inputs.name: habitatSetBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the Azure Devops build number from the habitat build

inputs.name: habitatSetImageNames
inputs.label: Write Image Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Write out the name of the image to be tagged to a file. File entries and filename can be set in the Advanced section below

inputs.name: habitatImageNames
inputs.label: Image Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of images that need to be tagged

inputs.name: habitatImageNamesFilename
inputs.label: Image Names Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the file that contains the image names to tag
